description:
GStreamer 1.24.7 multimedia framework rolls out with multiple bug fixes. Enhancements in qt6, rtspsrc, and more.

The post GStreamer 1.24.7 Released With Audio and Visual Bug Fixes appeared first on Linux Today.
title: GStreamer 1.24.7 Released With Audio and Visual Bug Fixes

description:
PipeWire 1.2.3 multimedia framework update is out now with an improved FFADO driver, fixes memory leaks, and enhances MIDI.

The post PipeWire 1.2.3 Rolls Out With Enhanced Audio Driver Capabilities appeared first on Linux Today.
title: PipeWire 1.2.3 Rolls Out With Enhanced Audio Driver Capabilities

description:
Highlights of KDE Gear 24.08 include new features in the Dolphin file manager to make it easier to access and manage files and folders that require administrative privileges, wizards to help install needed software, menu options to elevate your privileges, and a new “Move to New Folder…” option to create a folder and copy the […]

The post KDE Gear 24.08 Open-Source Software Suite Released With Many Improvements appeared first on Linux Today.
title: KDE Gear 24.08 Open-Source Software Suite Released With Many Improvements
